name: Nonogram: Sudoku Picture Cross
description:
Nonogram is a sudoku-like picture cross puzzle. You can follow simple rules to get the correct answers and complete the color picture in the world of pictocross.

Picross has lots of variant such as nonogram color, sudoku, block puzzle. Monogram combines logic with pixel art, reveal color pictures on the puzzle page. It is classic Japanese crosswords with hidden pictures.

Griddlers have simple rules, and are suitable for almost everyone. Solve picture crosswords after a hard workday or start your morning with monogram number puzzle. Maybe, nono can turn you into a logic sodoku world.

Are you ready for challenging your brain and complete the free numbers puzzles? Let's open the puzzle page and solve picross!

FEATURES

We offer five chapters for you to challenge this nonogram puzzles:

- tutorial helps you learn sudoku puzzles rules quickly.

- 5 difficulty modes and 3 grid sizes for the picture cross challenge.

- An infinite number of puzzles, all are free.

- Exploratory map, uncover the nonogram color picture behind it.

- Relaxing BGM that calms you down in the world of pixel logic puzzles.

- No Internet connection needed for your brain training in nanogram puzzles.

- Restart if you’ve made a mistake in a logic picture crossword.

Begin your kakuro journey and seek tic tac toe answers! We think you will enjoy our logic grid puzzles, and get the skills about the hanjie game.

CONTACT US

Thanks for your selecting our logic puzzles! We will make the game better and better.
